pages.text: $(bgreen)Scaredy Shroom$() don't want to see anybody, unless it's the man from the circus.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)25$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Huge Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)one spore$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy. It will $(bred)hide and stop attacking$() when target is too close. $(bred)It will sleep at daytime$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)several spores each tick$() which last 5 seconds.
